messages.subject: Re: Watsuki does gaming!
messages.msgSnippet: ... the ... the ... I think that the Shinsengumi characters of this work differ from Shinsengumi of RK considerably. However, they are very cool.
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> http://www.gamespot.com/all/news/news_6107066.html
>
> Watsuki is designing the characters for a new PS2 game based on
the
> Shinsengumi so does this mean his manga on the boys in blue is in
the
> works????????


I think that the Shinsengumi characters of this work differ from
Shinsengumi of RK considerably.
However, they are very cool.

http://ranobe.com/up/updata/up6349.jpg

Although this was the report of a Shonen Jump of Japan, I have not
noticed this at all.

At a Japanese site, there is almost no information about this.^^;;;

momoiro-usagi

messages.subject: Re: Watsuki does gaming!
messages.msgSnippet: ... the ... That s good news! At least Watsuki-sensei is getting back to the historical genre,even if it is a game... With him working on this, Ithink it s
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> http://www.gamespot.com/all/news/news_6107066.html
>
> Watsuki is designing the characters for a new PS2 game based on the
> Shinsengumi so does this mean his manga on the boys in blue is in
the
> works????????
>
> --
> Barbara Sheridan
> http://www.barbarasheridan.net
>
>
>

That's good news! At least Watsuki-sensei is getting back to the
historical genre,even if it is a game... With him working on this,
Ithink it's reasonable to expect the manga...

Geez!Now with all the stuff to catch up on! 3 games! Wow! And I lost
the bidding too on the Shinsengumi game in ebay a month or so back.
sigh...

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Watsuki does gaming!
messages.msgSnippet: That would be odd considering his current manga (Busou no Renkin, if I m correct)  is really quite new and still running Shonen Jump. Unless he s not happy
messages.messageBody:
That would be odd considering his current manga (Busou no Renkin, if I'm correct) is really quite new and still running Shonen Jump. Unless he's not happy with it...

Personally would love him to do Shinsengumi right. As much as I like all these incarnations of the Shinsengumi, I think he takes it more seriously than some.

S

messages.subject: Watsuki does gaming!

messages.messageBody:
http://www.gamespot.com/all/news/news_6107066.html

Watsuki is designing the characters for a new PS2 game based on the
Shinsengumi so does this mean his manga on the boys in blue is in the
works????????

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
